attributes.action: Do not go to war with Iran
attributes.additional_details:
The world is increasingly alarmed at Donald Trump’s escalation of conflict with Iran. Trump has scrapped the deal which was meant to prevent the development of nuclear weapons there, has imposed sanctions aimed at destroying the Iranian oil trade

In this he is being encouraged by his national security advisor, John Bolton, an architect of the Iraq war and a man committed to military solutions. Speculation that 120,00 US troops are being deployed to the Middle East to confront Iran is worrying.
attributes.background: We demand that the British government condemn the brinkmanship and publicly oppose military action against Iran.
